thread.title: Emmerdale's Amy Walsh engaged to boyfriend Bradley Jaden (after big sister Kimberley set them up!)
thread.title_full: Emmerdale's Amy Walsh engaged to boyfriend Bradley Jaden (after big sister Kimberley set them up!)

author: Lara Martin
title: Emmerdale's Amy Walsh engaged to boyfriend Bradley Jaden (after big sister Kimberley set them up!)
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Emmerdale actress Amy Walsh is engaged to boyfriend Bradley Jaden - after big sister Kimberley set them up! 
Amy, who plays Tracy Shankley in the ITV soap, said yes to a proposal from musical theatre star Bradley when he got down on one knee during a recent holiday in Thailand. 
Impressively, the big moment happened a whopping six months ago, but both Amy and Bradley kept the news quiet until now. 
She told OK magazine: “I genuinely didn’t know what was happening until he got down on one knee. 
“I just thought, no, this can’t be that! Then I burst into tears. 
“It’s an amazing feeling. Everything feels more solidified between us.” Amy Walsh is engaged to boyfriend Bradley Jaden (Photo: Twitter/Amy Walsh) They became engaged six months ago (Photo: Twitter/Bradley Jaden) Read More Kimberley Walsh shows off new baby son Cole as she reveals plan for first wedding anniversary 
Amy and Bradley were set up by Girls Aloud star Kimberley, after she appeared alongside Bradley in Shrek The Musical in London’s West End a few years ago. 
Kimberley has always looked out for her little sister Amy by vetting her boyfriends and making it clear when she didn’t think they came up to scratch. 
So when she met a handsome single man while starring as Princess Fiona in Shrek The Musical in London’s West End, she took matters into her own hands. 
In an interview with Mirror Online two years ago, Amy, 29, laughed as she recalled her sister’s matchmaking two and a half years ago which led to her meeting actor Bradley, 29. 
She said: “Kimberley was starring in the musical and Bradley was understudying the part of Shrek so they all did their rehearsals together. 
“She got friendly with him and invited him along to her 30th birthday party. Amy's sister Kimberley Walsh with husband Justin Scott (Photo: Dave Hogan) Family Business: Girls Aloud star Kimberly Walsh's sister Amy Walsh has spoken about her own showbiz career (Photo: Eastnews) 
“She did some expert matchmaking. She is always very protective with me, ­especially when it comes to boys, so to have her approval of him early on helped him out in a big way. 
“Before the party she told me, ‘there is someone going along tonight who might be interested in you’, so she planted the seed and it happened. We just hit it off, so it was thanks to her.” Match Made: Amy Walsh met boyfriend Bradley Jaden while starring in the musical Shrek (Photo: Eastnews) So Happy: Amy on a recent date with beau Bradley (Photo: Eastnews) Pub Talk: Amy plays feisty Tracy in Emmerdale (Photo: ITV) 
Amy joined Emmerdale two years ago as Tracy Shankley, a chaotic character. She admits she loved every moment on the long-running ITV1 soap. 
Amy said she and Bradley love being around kids but had no plans to start a family of their own just yet. 
“We are both broody but we have lots of nieces and nephews to occupy us,” she says. “Our careers come first at the moment. But we have just moved in with each other which is very exciting.” Like us on Facebook
